eng.aboutme:
Hello! I'm David Quintanilla Ruiz, a programmer who also dabbles in the world of design. I consider myself a fast learner and possess notable communication and leadership skills. Currently, I have expertise in creating and designing websites. I am someone who easily adapts to the needs of the moment and I have also experimented with mobile applications.

My most important project has been 'Expediente Docente,' a platform that is still being developed for the 'Universidad Centroamericana' in my country, Nicaragua.

Currently, I am a student of Systems Engineering at the 'Universidad Centroamericana' of Nicaragua, and I expect to complete my studies in 2026.

Among my interests are playing video games, watching technology videos, and occasionally drawing.
